attributes.action: Review the current system and process of child maintenance .
attributes.additional_details:
This is something I've been saying for years that if I could make a change I would .
So I'm speaking on behalf of my children and others in the same situation.

As lone parents whether they work or not are paid a dedicated amount for the children . However the other parent isn't expected to support the child with that same objective. 

Having Less financial support has a impact on the children emotionally ,socially and developmental.
It's time to make a stand and change the future .
attributes.background:
The current system and process of child maintenance isn't working and needs to change. 
In particular those on benefits who only have to pay a very small amount towards their children .
This is something that's not only affected Me and my children but other families across the UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about existing rules for child maintenance, but we're not sure exactly what you want a review to look at. If you want to increase the amount that a parent is required to pay towards child maintenance, you could start a new petition which asks the Government for this specific action.

We also have a number of petitions which are currently open on the topic of child maintenance which you might like to sign:

Calculate child maintenance based on actual child expenses
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588390

Make non-payment of child maintenance a criminal offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601484

Review how the the Child Maintenance Service investigate and enforce non-payment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593812

Increase flat rate of Child Maintenance to £21.15 p/w
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598757
